column2: Percentage of U.S. youths with a major depressive episode in the past year from 2004 to 2020, by gender

column5: This statistic depicts the percentage of U.S. youths with a major depressive episode in the past year from 2004 to 2020, by gender. In 2020, some 9 percent of male respondents and 25 percent of female respondents reported that they had a major depressive episode in the past year.

column3: Results from the 2020 National Survey on Drug Use and Health: Detailed Tables, page 1,847
